segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, looking so expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, waiting for a cookie, and it's really cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't hear them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely focused on her brother and the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often, sneaking cookies when no one's looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to trust her brother to get the cookies for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their little secret moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she's standing there, so patiently, it's really sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into trouble for this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's his little partner in crime, and it's adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR
